item.title: Future Plans of This Site
item.description: Now it looks great! But the remaining modification on the original template is still to be done. I would upload some of my progress onto this site later.

item.title: My first post with hugo
item.description: Hi! This is my first trial with Hugo. Hope it works fine as expected!
